CustomField.formula: OR( ISBLANK(Name__c), ISPICKVAL(Announcement__r.Status__c, 'Published'), IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(BusinessRole__c, 'Program Reviewer'), ISPICKVAL(BusinessRole__c, 'Fiscal Reviewer'), ISPICKVAL(BusinessRole__c, 'Executive Reviewer') ), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Sent for Review'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Review Complete')), True ) )
CustomField.label: Hide Initiate Review(Obsolete)
